summary: Successfully integrated Google OAuth authentication into the Getnius market research platform. Updated app/page.tsx to show AuthScreen for unauthenticated users and MarketIntelligenceTool for authenticated users. Added UserProfile component with avatar, user info dropdown, and sign-out functionality to the main app header. Created auth test page for verification. All authentication UI is now properly connected to the app flow with session management, loading states, and protected routes.
current_status: Google authentication integration is complete. The app now requires authentication before accessing the main market intelligence tools. Users see a beautiful landing page with Google sign-in when not logged in, and authenticated users get the full app experience with user profile management in the header. Development server is running and ready for testing once Google OAuth credentials are configured in .env.local file.
